title: Fire elemental

==Useful Info==
'''Fire elementals''' are animated beings of flame, dealing purely fire damage with their attacks and leaving a trail of flame [[cloud]]s behind them. They are resistant to most elements, but vulnerable to cold and fragile in general.

They are rarely found normally except in fire-themed vaults or as part of [[Azrael]]'s band of monsters, though you can summon them yourself by  invoking [[Qazlal]]'s Elemental Force when clouds of fire (including those from a forest fire) are visible.

==Tips & Tricks==
*[[Fire resistance]] will reduce their damage tremendously.
*A couple of zaps from a [[wand of iceblast]] or other cold attack should destroy them.
*They have complete immunity to fire damage. Although they ignore most [[Fire Magic]], you can still take them out with either [[Bolt of Magma]] or [[Fire Storm]], as those also deal physical damage.
*If using Qazlal's Elemental Force, the friendliness of the elemental will depend on the source of the cloud: Your clouds are friendly, ambient clouds are neutral, enemy clouds are hostile.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.28]], they were [[:Category:Water_vulnerability|vulnerable to water]].
*Prior to [[0.19]], you could summon your own fire elementals by evoking a [[lamp of fire]].
